Constructor Detail

Tactics

public Tactics()
Method Detail

singleTactic

public Board3d singleTactic(Board3d board)
This method checks for single values. A given cell, look what values are in same column, row or quadrant and delete these values from this cell if they are still in cell

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state to be updated.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

updateSingle

public int[][] updateSingle(int[][] array,
                            int index,
                            java.lang.String type)
Updates the sudoku, if there is just a single possibility for a cell. Checks a row, column or quadrant for a single value, and then fills it in.

Parameters:
array - A row, column or quadrant in which a single might be found.
index - The index number of the row, column or quadrant.
type - The name of what type is put in, a row, column or quadrant.
Returns:
The updated row, column or quadrant.

hiddenSingleTactic

public Board3d hiddenSingleTactic(Board3d board)
This method checks for hidden single values. Calls the updateHiddenSingle, so it can be checked for every row, column or quadrant.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state to be updated.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

updateHiddenSingle

public int[][] updateHiddenSingle(int[][] array,
                                  int index,
                                  java.lang.String type)
Updates the sudoku, if there is just a single hidden possibility for a cell. Checks a row, column or quadrant for a hidden single value, and then fills it in.

Parameters:
array - A row, column or quadrant in which a hidden single might be found.
index - The index number of the row, column or quadrant.
type - The name of what type is put in, a row, column or quadrant.
Returns:
The updated row, column or quadrant.

lockedCandidates1Tactic

public Board3d lockedCandidates1Tactic(Board3d board)
Updates the sudoku, if there are type 1 locked candidates in the sudoku. This method iterates through all the values and quadrants to check for locked candidates.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state to be updated.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

updateLockedCandidatesValQ

public Board3d updateLockedCandidatesValQ(Board3d board,
                                          int value,
                                          int q)
Checks in a specific quadrant if there is a locked candidate for the specified value. If it finds a locked candidate it removes it from the 3d board state.

Parameters:
board - The board to be updated.
value - The value to be updated
q - The quadrant to be checked.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

valueOnSingleRowOrColumnOfQuadrant

public int valueOnSingleRowOrColumnOfQuadrant(Board3d board,
                                              int q,
                                              int value,
                                              java.lang.String rowOrColumn)
Checks how many times a value appears in a row or column in a specified quadrant.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state to be updated.
q - The number of the quadrant.
value - The value which needs to be searched for.
rowOrColumn - Contains the value "row" or "column", so there can be determined in what this method is searching.
Returns:
A row or column number.

deleteValueFromRow

public Board3d deleteValueFromRow(Board3d board,
                                  int row,
                                  int value,
                                  int q)
This method deletes a value in a specified row. The quadrant number is needed, so that there can be checked that the quadrant doesn't contain the value.

Parameters:
board - The 3dboard state which needs to be updated.
row - The row the value needs to be deleted from.
value - The value that needs to be deleted.
q - The quadrant the value needs to be deleted from.
Returns:
The updated 3Dboard state.

deleteValueFromColumn

public Board3d deleteValueFromColumn(Board3d board,
                                     int column,
                                     int value,
                                     int q)
This method deletes a value in a specified column. The quadrant number is needed, so that there can be checked that the quadrant doesn't contain the value.

Parameters:
board - The 3dboard state which needs to be updated.
column - The column the value needs to be deleted from.
value - The value that needs to be deleted.
q - The quadrant the value needs to be deleted from.
Returns:
The updated 3Dboard state.

useAllTactics

public Board3d useAllTactics(Board3d board)
Calls all the tactical methods, to solve the sudoku. The method also keeps track of the progress, if there is no progress it returns the update 3d board state.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state which needs to be updated.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

Updates the sudoku, if there are type 2 locked candidates in the sudoku. This method iterates through all the values and quadrants to check for locked candidates.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state to be updated.
Returns:
The updated 3d board state.

deleteValueFromQuadrant

public void deleteValueFromQuadrant(Board3d board,
                                    int q,
                                    int index,
                                    int value,
                                    java.lang.String rowOrColumn)
Deletes a value from a quadrant. This method deletes a value from a specified quadrant.

Parameters:
board - The board3d to be updated.
q - The quadrant the value needs to be deleted from.
index - The index of which the cell, which may not be deleted.
value - The value which, needs to be deleted.
rowOrColumn - Specifying whether the value needs to be deleted from a row or column.

columnValuesOnlyInQuad

                                  int c,
                                  int value)
This method checks in which quadrant the value from a specified column is.

Parameters:
board - The 3d board state.
c - The column number.
value - The value to be checked for.
Returns:
The quadrant, in which the value is found.
